Articles.Content:
Note: Out Now! You can find it under http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14241.0

Maybe a mod could close this thread please?

Hey!

I recently read through the 'What music do you listen to while playing KSP'-Threads and wondered if there was any ingame Music Player.

I didn\'t find any addons, and since I am quite good at C# I thought about giving this a shot (Never worked with Unity before.)

Now working on a Music Player with full GUI, Album Covers, ID3 Support (Scratch that, KSP IO Limitations wont let me) etc. and It\'s going pretty well.

I\'ll show some pics of the GUI once I can get my head round a pretty and final design (Almost finished).

I\'ll keep you updated on the development progress .

But, I need your help on one thing:

I\'ve spent weeks playing around in blender and still haven\'t got the hang of it,

my models never look decent so I do need someone to do a tiny little 'music' module, maybe as small as a RCS module.

Doesn\'t need to be fancy or anything, just fitting to the stock design.

Thanks!

~Naelo
That is fantastic Idea. Will make a simple model for you, when I wake up though, need to sleep first But this is just what I need for the long flights

Just a preview to see if this model is ok for you.

A little radio

And should I just send you the model file and texture, or should I make it so it is already ready to be used in KSP?

Just a preview to see if this model is ok for you.

A little radio

And should I just send you the model file and texture, or should I make it so it is already ready to be used in KSP?

Holy crap, is that a cassette player on that model? Good work.

I feel old now.

Holy crap, is that a cassette player on that model? Good work.

I feel old now.

Haha Yup always hated when the tape got stuck, and had to rewind it with a pencil
Could you, by any chance, have the plugin detect the current flight situation and dynamically adjust the music to suit it? That would be awesome.

I love the use of duct tape. Very Kerbal.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Just a preview to see if this model is ok for you.

A little radio

And should I just send you the model file and texture, or should I make it so it is already ready to be used in KSP?

Love it! Great work, Thanks!

If you could do any specific node definitions for the model in the .cfg for me, that would be a great help.

I\'d just take the other values from the RCS block.

Could you, by any chance, have the plugin detect the current flight situation and dynamically adjust the music to suit it? That would be awesome.

Depends on the situtation. If you mean like atmospheric flight, space flight things I\'m sure thats possible.

You would have to set which music is space and which is atmospheric yourself though.
This is exactly the sort of entertainment technology and attachment tech\' that I\'d expect from the boffins at the KSC
Love the Idea, I\'d use it All the time

It\'s actually out now. You can find it here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14241.0
Mind someone explain me why that link leads me to the forums main page instead to a so called "mod thread"?

Mind someone explain me why that link leads me to the forums main page instead to a so called "mod thread"?

Because this was posted a year ago and links were broken shortly afterwards when the forum was transitioned to a different forum software.

Given the game has also changed quite a bit in the mean time there's a good chance this plugin isn't going to work even if the thread still existed.

Hate to bump dead threads, I'm sorry, but is there anyone out there who still has the source or plugin files for this mod? I'd love to see if I can get it to work with .22

The links have long died, and Naelo seems to've discontinued the mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12550-0-15-Really-Advanced-Computer-Systems-Rev-1-1-Music-Player!-Countdown-inside!
